group_1.narration: After the thing with my keychain,@I stopped going to school.
I would leave my house in the morning,@and then just wander around outside.
I made one last phone call to my only friend.

group_1.textLeft: Hello? Um, this is Sana...
You see... Um... About that stuff with my@keychain...
I'm...um...I'm f-fine, so...
N-no, no... I mean...I should be the one@saying sorry...

group_1.narration: After that phone call,@the two of us grew apart.
I think she was really scared, too.
I mean, I knew there was@nothing she could've done.
But that painful void in my heart@seemed to only grow bigger and bigger.
That was when that creature appeared.

group_1.textLeft: Huh?
Miss Purrs? Miss Purrs?!
No, you're not her. Wait, are you a cat too?
...!@[chara:100401:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:100401:cheek_0][chara:100401:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:100401:lipSynch_1]D-did a cat just talk?

group_1.narration: That's when I first met Kyubey.
"If you become a Magical Girl,@I can grant you any wish."@That's what Kyubey told me...
I wish I could be close with my family.@I wish I could see Miss Purrs again.@I wish I could be close with my friend again.
But none of those wishes@crossed my mind then...
There's no way someone in my state@of mind would think of something like that.
I'd been betrayed by each and every one@of those relationships.
That's why, all that came to mind was...

group_1.textLeft: Take me to the animal village...
The animal village where Mr. Purrs-a-lot@and all of his friends live...
Heh...never mind.[chara:100401:lipSynch_0][wait:1.2][chara:100401:cheek_0][chara:100401:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:100401:lipSynch_1] Forget I ever mentioned@it...
Instead...
...make me invisible.
I want to disappear. Disappear from this@world...
I don't want to see anyone ever again...@And I don't want anybody to find me.
Because I'm completely useless! I'm an idiot,@and I never do anything right!
I can't get along with my family...I can't@even make a friend!
All I do is cause problems... I just exist to@get in the way!
That's why!
Please...make me invisible...

group_1.narration: And so I vanished from the world...
